title: Software Engineer (Full Stack)
summary: Cloud-native backend and data platform work on Google Cloud, building production services and pipelines with a focus on reliability and delivery.
highlights: Built and operated production backend services on GCP (Cloud Run / Functions / Pub/Sub) supporting daily workloads.
Designed ETL/ingestion workflows and standardized transformations to improve maintainability and reduce manual ops.
Delivered features end-to-end: API design, implementation, deployment, monitoring, and incident-driven improvements.

title: M.S. Natural Resources & Environment (Precision Agriculture)
summary: Developed ML workflows for multispectral drone imagery to estimate soil parameters (inorganic nitrogen, soil organic matter) and translate imagery into actionable insights.
highlights: Built datasets from multispectral drone imagery and structured ML pipelines for regression tasks.
Compared multiple models (SVR, MLP, ensembles) against lab methods and documented results.
